content:
Hi all -- I've made a number of changes in response to ballot comments and other Jira issues.

Call for review of pull requests

All the changes that may warrant discussion are split into the pull requests listed here. We would appreciate anyone who can look through these pull requests and provide review/comments.

I also preapplied several changes (listed here, and prefixed with the Jira issue number).

Agenda for Tuesday, Jan 4 @ 4pm EST

We will review some of these pull requests on this call, namely:

  • FHIR-33349: Changes related to gender (if @Grahame Grieve is there)
  • FHIR-34808: Populate Resource.langauge (if @Grahame Grieve and @Josh Mandel are there)
  • FHIR-34239 - if @Grahame Grieve is there re: HTML entities being displayed
  • Review value set for FHIR-34403: Include specimen collection supervision status in lab test profiles
  • Review changes in FHIR-33875: Look-and-feel - not following HL7 IG pattern (PR with screenshots)
  • FHIR-33652: Only use SNOMED for qualitative lab result coding - look at new value set
  • FHIR-33688: Diagrams would be helpful - review diagrams
  • FHIR-33586: Constraining .subject - does the new language make sense?

Ballot issue comments

I have added in Jira comments on many of the ballot issues. If you are the author of one of these ballot comments and want further discussion, please let me know and we can add you to the top of the agenda on Tuesday.

Happy new year, everyone! See you Tuesday afternoon.

FHIR-34239

this is just a bug, right? nothing for committee to talk about

Grahame Grieve said:

FHIR-34239

this is just a bug, right? nothing for committee to talk about

Correct -- just a bug -- something we wanted to clarify with narrative for our implementers
